verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* clearly \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w later|strong="G5306"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w will|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* turned \w away|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w giving|strong="G4337"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* minds \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* deceit, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w teachings|strong="G1319"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* evil \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*,
